channel.title: Virus Warning: Sponsored servers
channel.description:
Today the number 1 and 2 sponsored servers linked to a website that pretended to be a java applet, but installed a virus on your computer. I wrote a java applet myself to detect and remove this virus if it is found, it's safe to run no matter what, so I'd like everyone to go here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/remove.html And press 'run', it will tell you whether you are infected or not.
For more information on this, or for the code for my removal applet, go here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511352.msg3711498.html#msg3711498

item.title: Virus Warning: Sponsored servers
